meanings.sent1: The bandores were beautifully crafted and produced melodious sounds.
meanings.sent2: She played the bandores in the orchestra with skill and passion.
meanings.sent3: The bandores decided to start a band and play at local events.
meanings.sent4: The bandores' music was like a soothing balm for the soul.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the bandores made them stand out on stage.

meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see many bandores displayed together.
meanings.sent2: The musicians carried their bandores in sturdy cases.
meanings.sent3: The bandores were having a party to celebrate their plural form.
meanings.sent4: The bandores stood out in the music world like a group of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The collection of bandores was a sight to behold, each unique in its own way.
